rules.command: if ($customization.findValue -eq 'Discord.exe') { & nircmd.exe win max process 'Discord.exe'; & Write-Host 'Discord maximized' }

rules._comment: if WhatsApp, make normal, activate, and resize to right half of screen
rules.command: if ($customization.findValue -eq 'WhatsApp') { & nircmd.exe win normal ititle 'WhatsApp'; & nircmd.exe win activate ititle 'WhatsApp'; & nircmd.exe win setsize ititle 'WhatsApp' -1287 0 1294 1039; & Write-Host 'WhatsApp snapped to right' }
